name: Sales Partner ItemGroup Wise Commission
query:
select 
tpe.posting_date as PaymentDate,
tpe.party as Customer,
per.allocated_amount as Amount,
tpe.name as PaymentEntryReference,
per.reference_name as SalesInvoice,
c.default_sales_partner As SalesPartner,
spigc.item_group as ItemGroup, 
spigc.commission_percent as CommissionPercent, 
per.allocated_amount*spigc.commission_percent as CommissionAmount
from `tabPayment Entry` tpe 
inner join `tabPayment Entry Reference` per on per.parent = tpe.name
and per.reference_doctype = 'Sales Invoice'
inner join tabCustomer  AS c ON c.name = tpe.party
inner join `tabSales Invoice`  as si on per.reference_name = si.name
INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item`  as sit on sit.parent = si.name
INNER JOIN `tabSales Partner` AS sp on c.default_sales_partner = sp.name
INNER JOIN `tabItem Groupwise Commission CT` as spigc on spigc.parent = sp.name
and sit.item_group = spigc.item_group
where tpe.payment_type='Receive'
